movies.title: Ano natsu no hi
movies.plot: Yuta, an absent-minded 5th-grader, is sent to spend the summer with his grandfather, whom Yuta's parents think is becoming senile and could benefit from Yuta's companionship. At first, Yuta thinks Gramps is a bit addled, too, but as he gets to know the old man better, he finds that his grandfather sees things quite differently from other people. The special bond that often develops between grandfather and grandson grows stronger and stronger until the magical and heartwarming finale.
movies.simplePlot: Yuta, an absent-minded 5th-grader, is sent to spend the summer with his grandfather, whom Yuta's parents think is becoming senile and could benefit from Yuta's companionship. At first, Yuta...

biography.bio: Takuro Atsuki is an actor, known for Ano natsu no hi (1999), Yodogawa Nagaharu monogatari - Kôbe-hen: Sainara (1999) and Switching - Goodbye Me (2007).
biography.name: Takuro Atsuki

biography.bio: Keiju Kobayashi was born on November 23, 1923 in Gunma, Japan. He was an actor, known for Sanjuro (1962), Si tu tends l'oreille (1995) and Samurai Assassin (1965). He died on September 16, 2010 in Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Keiju Kobayashi

biography.bio: Kin Sugai was born on February 28, 1926 in Tokyo, Japan as Kimiko Susai. She is an actress, known for Dodes'ka-den (1970), Ikiru (1952) and The Funeral (1984).
biography.name: Kin Sugai

biography.bio: Kyûsaku Shimada was born on April 24, 1955 in Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Shin Godzilla (2016), Tokyo: The Last Megalopolis (1988) and The Princess Blade (2001).
biography.name: Kyûsaku Shimada

biography.bio: Miyuki Matsuda was born on October 6, 1961 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress and producer, known for Audition (1999), Still the Water (2014) and Kuroe (2001). She was previously married to Yûsaku Matsuda.
biography.name: Miyuki Matsuda

biography.bio: Nanami Sano is an actress, known for Ano natsu no hi (1999).
biography.name: Nanami Sano

biography.bio: Kanae Katsuno was born on January 11, 1982 in Shizuoka, Japan. She is an actress, known for La mère (2001), Ano natsu no hi (1999) and Sono hi no mae ni (2008).
biography.name: Kanae Katsuno

biography.bio: Kunihiko Hisamitsu is an actress, known for Ano natsu no hi (1999).
biography.name: Kunihiko Hisamitsu

biography.bio: Aoi Miyazaki was born on November 30, 1985 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012), The Great Passage (2013) and Eureka (2000). She was previously married to Sôsuke Takaoka.
biography.name: Aoi Miyazaki

biography.bio: Hikari Ishida was born on May 25, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Chizuko's Younger Sister (1991), Séance (2000) and Aitsu (1991).
biography.name: Hikari Ishida

biography.bio: Katsuya Koiso is an actor, known for A Scene at the Sea (1991), Karin (1993) and Ano natsu no hi (1999).
biography.name: Katsuya Koiso

biography.bio: Shinya Yamamoto was born on June 16, 1939 in Tokyo, Japan. He is a director and actor, known for Kin chan no Cinema Jack (1993), Zangyaku jokei-shi (1976) and Nikutai joyû nikki (1967).
biography.name: Shinya Yamamoto

biography.bio: Wakaba Irie was born on May 12, 1943 in Shiba, Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for I Are You, You Am Me (1982), The Little Girl Who Conquered Time (1983) and Chizuko's Younger Sister (1991).
biography.name: Wakaba Irie

biography.bio: Shiho Akutagawa is an actress, known for Ano natsu no hi (1999).
biography.name: Shiho Akutagawa

biography.bio: Kôichi Ueda was born on April 2, 1941 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Shall We Dance? (1996), The Eel (1997) and Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla II (1993).
biography.name: Kôichi Ueda
